title: Nepal Climate Change Synthetic Dataset
description: Synthetic climate data for Nepal showing baseline (2020) and projected (2050) conditions

variables.temperature: Monthly average temperature in degrees Celsius
variables.admin_regions: Administrative regions with climate vulnerability index
variables.rivers: Major river systems with projected flow changes
variables.glaciers: Glacier monitoring points with retreat rates

notes: This is synthetic data for demonstration purposes. It should not be used for actual climate research or planning.
